trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Pleasanton
There were no other sightings in Pleasanton on or around February 7th 2002
divs: Sighting Details I was in my front yard listening to my cd player.I looked up at the sky and saw this black disk. at frist I though it was anairplane. When I looked at it again thats when I knew it was a ufo I was scared,shakey, nervous, my whole body was numb and lots of other things that happed.Its hard to explain what was going on with my body.The ufo was a disk shape witha dome top it was black in color.After I kept on looking at it, it took off sofast I didnt even see it take off. I scanned the sky for it but there was nosing of the ufo.
